title: Resurrect Ghost (beta)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Resurrect Ghost is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 38 Magic to be cast, in addition to having two prayer points. The spell was available to test during the Arceuus Spellbook Beta.

content:
Resurrect Ghost is a temporary piece of content found only in unrestricted worlds.
The contents of this page refer to a piece of content only available on temporary unrestricted worlds as a means to test it before release.
Its design is subject to change, and the graphics are used as a placeholder.
Resurrect Ghost
Released 28 April 2021 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 38
Spellbook Arceuus
Type Combat
Experience 55
Runes 10 1 5
Casting speed 50 ticks
Quest A Kingdom Divided
Description Unknown (edit)
Animation
Sound Effect
Please add a sound effect!

Resurrect Ghost is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 38 Magic to be cast, in addition to having two prayer points. The spell was available to test during the Arceuus Spellbook Beta.

The spell will summon a ghostly thrall, which has an attack speed of 4 (attacking every 2.4 seconds) and attacks using Magic (with a max hit of 1), ignoring any accuracy checks in the process. They will attack the same target that the player is attacking, and cannot be damaged. However, they cannot attack other players.

Ghostly thralls will remain for a set amount of time ( 0.6 ∗ M a g i c L e v e l {\displaystyle 0.6*MagicLevel} seconds), but players can cast resurrection spells again after 30 seconds, albeit the existing thrall will disappear if players do so.

After feedback from the beta, the spell was polled in Phosani's Nightmare Poll to have three tiers instead of one, resulting in the release of the spells Resurrect Lesser Ghost, Resurrect Superior Ghost, and Resurrect Greater Ghost.

[[File:Resurrect Ghost icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Resurrect Ghost''' is a spell within the [[Arceuus spellbook]] that requires level 38 [[Magic]] to be cast, in addition to having two [[prayer points]]. The spell was available to test during the [[Unrestricted_world#Arceuus_Spellbook_Beta|Arceuus Spellbook Beta]].

The spell will summon a [[ghostly thrall (beta)|ghostly thrall]], which has an [[attack speed]] of 4 (attacking every 2.4 seconds) and attacks using [[Magic]] (with a max hit of 1), ignoring any accuracy checks in the process. They will attack the same target that the player is attacking, and cannot be damaged. However, they '''cannot''' attack other players.

Ghostly thralls will remain for a set amount of time (<math>0.6 * MagicLevel</math> seconds), but players can cast resurrection spells again after 30 seconds, albeit the existing thrall will disappear if players do so.

After feedback from the beta, the spell was polled in [[Poll:Phosani's Nightmare Poll|Phosani's Nightmare Poll]] to have three tiers instead of one, resulting in the release of the spells [[Resurrect Lesser Ghost]], [[Resurrect Superior Ghost]], and [[Resurrect Greater Ghost]].
